name: clients
ddl: CREATE TABLE clients (_id varchar (20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, short_name varchar (40) NOT NULL, client_geo varchar (30), geo_coord varchar (40), "desc" text, log_num integer, log_table varchar (20), enterprise_name VARCHAR (100), detailed_location CHAR (100), country CHAR (10), province CHAR (10), city CHAR (10), town CHAR (10), personnel TEXT, telephone CHAR (10), email CHAR (10), person_responsible CHAR (20), create_time DATETIME, update_time DATETIME, en_name VARCHAR);
